name: Lost Property (KDSgenki)
description:
A 2d platformer taking place in an abandoned school. Your mission, defeat the strange manifestations of those everyday lost and found items you'd typically find at your average school and return them to the sacred "Lost Property" box

WASD/Arrows Keys: Movement
Space: Jump
Left Ctrl: Attack

Made by: Thomas Pasley, Asli Baltaci, Kieran De Sousa.

Thomas Pasley - Lead gameplay programmer.

Asli Baltaci - All art assets, Boss room design.

Kieran De Sousa - Level design, UI design and scripting, health programming.

Our very first game and game jam!
